supabase_api_keys.method: Environment variables required: NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL, NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY, SUPABASE_JWT_SECRET
supabase_api_keys.evidence: Keys need to be obtained from Supabase dashboard
supabase_api_keys.action_required: Obtain Supabase project credentials from Supabase dashboard

database_connection_string.evidence: Connection string needs to be obtained from Supabase dashboard
database_connection_string.action_required: Obtain PostgreSQL connection string from Supabase dashboard

vercel_access.method: Vercel account and project access required
vercel_access.evidence: Vercel account needed for frontend deployment
vercel_access.action_required: Create Vercel account or configure existing project

render_access.method: Render account and service access required
render_access.evidence: Render account needed for backend deployment
render_access.action_required: Create Render account or configure existing service

notes: Supabase credentials are blocking for local development
Deployment credentials (Vercel, Render) are needed for production but not blocking for development
Secret storage workflow is properly configured with .env.example template
recommendations: Obtain Supabase project credentials before proceeding with environment validation
Document Supabase project URL and API keys in secure location
Configure environment variables before running validation suite
Set up Vercel and Render accounts for deployment readiness
